author: in
Alexander, Christopher: Notes on the Synthesis of Form

author: tag
Alexander, Christopher: unterschied + eigenschaft + aufschreiben + unendlich + verlassen + undefiniert + information + statement + task + aufgabe + gegeben

author: quote
Alexander, Christopher: Unfortunately, the list of distinguishable characteristics we can write down [...] is infitnite. [...] The only reason we are able to match one thing with another at all is that we rely on a good deal of unexpressed information contained in the statement of the task, and take a great deal for granted.
